title: Wall Street Breakfast August 5: Robinhood Shares Surge
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
Our top stories today are: Shares of online investing app Robinhood surge 50% Wednesday, travel and airline stocks take a hit because of new COVID restrictions and Roku shares fall after the streaming platform reports slower-than-estimated growth.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
